citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
The report to the institutional official dated 10/21/2022 was reviewed but not signed by a majority of the IACUC members.
Signatures of the IACUC members ensure that the committee is documenting their accountability for the oversight of the
animal care and use program. The facility must ensure that a majority of the IACUC members sign the semiannual report
to the Institutional Official.
Correct by: the next semi annual report to the Institutional Official.

citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
During performance of two separate protocols, x1-056 and x1-059, a staff member did not perform the twice daily post
operative monitoring as approved in the protocols. Internal post approval monitoring identified the discrepancies and the
institution moved to ensure that further work was halted until the protocols could be reviewed and any discrepancies could
be rectified as needed through protocol amendment. The facility must ensure that protocols are conducted in compliance
with approved methods.
The non compliance was corrected through the departure of the staff member and by amendment and modification of the
protocols to clarify appropriate post operative monitoring methods.

citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care.
citations.narrative:
Pig number 538 on protocol 00056 was observed to be unexpectedly lame on 11/2/2022 after an approved surgical
procedure, and was given analgesics by the laboratory staff but not reported to the veterinarian for guidance. Timely
communication with the attending veterinarian when unexpected health concerns occur is necessary to ensure that
appropriate guidance and treatment on problems of animal health can be given to ensure animal welfare. The facility
must ensure that communication with the attending veterinarian occurs in a direct and timely fashion.
Correction has already been made by retraining the laboratory staff.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representatives.
End Section
